title: When should we eat 7 Ajwa dates as per the hadith, before or after Fajr #ajwa #quran assim al hakeem
transcript: [Music] so you know like theith like um that like you're meant to take seven a dates in the morning um do you take it after F or when you wake up the moment you wake up from night sleep if you're up to uh uh eating your seven AA dates go ahead but if you're going to take a nap for a couple of hours then you wake up for for your breakfast then take it then either way it's fine
